exploreMoreDescription: Discover our full range of premium vitamins and supplements
aboutContent: 500 mg Echinacea per vegan tablet - Each tablet contains 500 mg of Echinacea purpurea, known to contribute to the normal functioning of the immune system. This supplement is not only great for maintaining a healthy immune system but is also full of antioxidants. Our products are non-GMO and manufactured according to GMP standards, the highest manufacturing standards in the world. Includes a 100% money-back guarantee for risk-free purchase.
descriptionContent: Nutriota Echinacea 500mg offers natural, high-quality Echinacea purpurea in convenient tablet form. This traditional herbal supplement supports immune system function and provides antioxidant benefits. Each bottle contains 240 tablets manufactured in a GMP compliant facility, ensuring premium quality and potency for your wellness routine.
ingredientsContent: Echinacea (echinacea purpurea), microcrystalline cellulose, dicalcium phosphate magnesium stearate, silicon dioxide, hydroxypropylmethylcellulose, glycerin, carnauba wax
informationContent: Additives: Echinacea | Units: 240 count | Brand: Nutriota | Format: Tablet | Age Range Description: Adult
